nascent: The reporting framework is not yet integrated.
emerging: The Impact Management Capability has defined the reporting requirements for the organization.
expanding: The Impact Management Capability has developed a reporting framework to guide consistent reporting across the organization.
optimising: There is widespread understanding of what will be required in terms of reporting.
mature: The reporting framework supports standardized reporting in line with requirements.

emerging: Reporting requirements have been defined in consultation with internal stakeholders.
expanding: The reporting framework is aligned to the Impact Strategy and IMF.
optimising: Reporting templates have been developed to support execution.
